bibl.title: Second and Third International Congress on Greek and Arabic Studies, Delphi 1985 and Athens 1988
bibl.note: An attempt to collect evidence on the rules that regulated river traffic.
EL ABBADI Mostafa, A Code of Navigation on the Nile in Greco-Roman Egypt.
Second and Third International Congress on Greek and Arabic Studies, Delphi 1985 and Athens 1988 = Graeco-Arabica 4 (1991) pp. 157-162.
